details:
Evince is a simple multi-page document viewer.  It can display and print
 PostScript (PS), Encapsulated PostScript (EPS), DjVu, DVI, Portable
 Document Format (PDF) and XML Paper Specification (XPS) files.
 When supported by the document, it also allows searching for text,
 copying text to the clipboard, hypertext navigation, and
 table-of-contents bookmarks.
 suite::gnome, uitoolkit::gtk, use::viewing, works-with-format::TODO,
 works-with-format::djvu, works-with-format::dvi,
 works-with-format::pdf, works-with-format::postscript,
 works-with::text, x11::application
